snippet: Salvatore Costanzo, who has multiple sclerosis, hopes to one day lift his foot on his own again with the help of a medical device that sends signals to his nervous system.
abstract: Catholic Charities Brooklyn and Queens helps Salvatore Costanzo, who has multiple sclerosis, purchase a Bioness, medical device that sends signals to his nervous system to aid his mobility.
lead_paragraph: Salvatore Costanzo, who has multiple sclerosis, hopes to one day lift his foot on his own again with the help of a medical device that sends signals to his nervous system.

headline.seo: Fighting the Daily Effects of Multiple Sclerosis
headline.main: Fighting Hidden Illness Whose Draining Effects Are Noticed Every Day
